content: Adjusted EBITDA, which we defined as EBITDA without giving effect to equity based compensation expense and non-core, non-recurring items, was approximately $4.4 million or 15.6% of revenue for the quarter compared to $13 million or 38.5% of revenue for the same period in the prior year. Adjusted net income, which we defined as net income without giving effect to non-core non-recurring items and income tax expense assuming a corporate rate of 26%, was approximately $2.2 million for the quarter or $0.16 and $0.15 per adjusted basic and diluted EPS, respectively.
